headline: 1 Deeply Undervalued Stock to Buy in the Market Correction
summary: Pfizer's (NYSE: PFE) shares have been southbound for the better part of three years, partly because it was unable to repeat its incredible financial performance during the early pandemic years.  At these levels, Pfizer's shares might just be a steal.  The Trump administration has so far spared pharmaceuticals from its announced tariffs, but has threatened several times to impose some on the industry.
